Sentencas: Extensive research has been carried out to search new electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) in order to reduce their operating temperature in the intermediate temperature range (500 degree celsius < t < 800 degree celsius) for wide commercialization.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)

Sentencas: Recently, alkali doped strontium silicates materials have been reported to show adequate ionic conductivity in the intermediate temperature range.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)

Sentencas: Hence, in the present work, we have tried to synthesize trimeric Sr3-3xNa3xSi3O9-delta (0.00 <= x <= 0.20; SNS) system and did a comprehensive study on this system to examine its applicability as a solid electrolyte for electrochemical devices such as IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)

Sentencas: The SNS system was prepared via solid state reaction route and characterized by means of XRD, FT-IR and Raman spectroscopy to authenticate the structural phase formation and to gather its spectroscopic traits.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)

Sentencas: The optical Energy band gap of the system was calculated by means of UV-Visible absorption spectroscopy.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)

Sentencas: Surface morphology, microstructure and elemental confinement of the system was examined via Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM) and Energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDX) techniques.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)

Sentencas: The ionic transport study of the system has been conducted via AC conductivity analysis and Electrical Impedance Spectroscopy (EIS) technique.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)

Sentencas: The highest total conductivity similar to 0.46x10(-2) Scm(-1) at 650 degree celsius was found for the composition Sr2.40Na0.60Si3O9-delta thru EIS method.
Titulo: Investigation of structural, morphological, and ionic conduction behaviour of Na+ substituted trimeric strontium silicate Sr3-3x Na3xSi3O9-δ (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.20)
